Description: Explicit control over the HCL color scheme.
Important for most of our data manipulation.
Extra themes, scales and geoms for ggplot.
Consistent/convenient function signatures for manipulating dates.
Explicit control over the Color Brewer colors.  See http://colorbrewer2.org/.
Creates documentation Rd file from (well-formed) comments.
Heavier testing framework that's good for package development.
Data manipulation not covered in dplyr.
